subcategories.name: Online / Bandit Learning
subcategories.what_is_covered: Sequential decision-making that minimises cumulative regret under uncertainty.

subcategories.name: Reinforcement Learning & Multi-Agent Decision-Making
subcategories.what_is_covered: Trial-and-error control for single or multiple agents, including sample-efficient and offline variants.
subcategories.typical_examples: reinforcement learning, sample-efficient robustness, offline learning, multi-agent games

subcategories.typical_examples: continual learning, neural combinatorial optimisation, knowledge-graph reasoning
